Package com.carrentalsystem.controller

Interface ILeaseService

All Known Implementing Classes:
LeaseService
public interface ILeaseService
The ILeaseService interface defines the contract for lease-related operations in the Car Rental System.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description

  • Method Details

    • createLease

      void createLease(int leaseID, int vehicleID, int customerID, Date startDate, Date endDate, String type, String state)
      Creates a new lease.
      Parameters:
      leaseID - The ID of the lease.
      vehicleID - The ID of the vehicle being leased.
      customerID - The ID of the customer leasing the vehicle.
      startDate - The start date of the lease.
      endDate - The end date of the lease.
      type - The type of lease (e.g., "DailyLease", "MonthlyLease").
      state - The state of the lease (e.g., "active", "terminated").

    • returnCar

      List<Lease> returnCar(int leaseID) throws LeaseNotFoundException
      Returns a leased car, ending the lease.
      Parameters:
      leaseID - The ID of the lease to return the car for.
      Returns:
      A list of leases with the returned car.
      Throws:
      LeaseNotFoundException - if the lease is not found.

    • listActiveLeases

      List<Lease> listActiveLeases()
      Retrieves a list of active leases.
      Returns:
      A list of active leases.

    • listLeaseHistory

      List<Lease> listLeaseHistory()
      Retrieves a list of lease history.
      Returns:
      A list of lease history.

    • calculateLeaseCost

      double calculateLeaseCost(int leaseID)
      Calculates the cost of a lease.
      Parameters:
      leaseID - The ID of the lease.
      Returns:
      The cost of the lease.
